name: Structure_Bocca_3-shelf_Narrow_Bookcase
reviews: We bought this bookshelf because it was the perfect narrow size for our son's nursery. We couldn't find one in the yellow oak stain that would match the rest of the nursery, so we looked everywhere for a bookshelf that was REAL WOOD so we could sand and stain it to match. This bookshelf says that it's material is wood, but it is really particle board/MDF with a woodgrain sticker on the outside, so we cannot sand or stain it. Our baby is due this week, so I don't want to mess with trying to repackage and return it, and we'll now have to paint it... I never would have bought this if I knew it was cheap material. Buyer beware.

Bought this in white for our mud / laundry room entry. Perfect size for my husband's size 12 work boots! Heavy-duty, solid piece, that is not going to be "sagging" or warping any time soon - and probably not ever. Very nice finish - one that will easily handle regular cleaning since we are using this to put shoes in [versus books or decorative items]. The size could not be more perfect - for what we're using it for!
Don't love the color - looks unfinished. We stained it and it is a little better.
description:
The Structure bookcase collection allows for you to mix and match pieces and optional add-ins to fit your space and your needs. The shorter stature narrow bookcase is ideal for small areas where multifunctional storage is required. With three shelves, the bookcase can stand alone in a tight space or join forces with other Structure pieces to form a solid storage area that can hold baskets, office supplies, or eclectic art displays. A slim width allows for design that is compact and desirable for an array of spaces. A comforting oak finish adds a modern organic feel to the room making working furniture fit naturally.

Set includes: One (1) bookshelfMaterials: PEFC certified sustainable wood Finish: Oak, whiteDimensions: 45.1 inches high x 16.8 inches wide x 13.8 inches deep StyleContemporaryMaterialWoodFinishOak Finish, White FinishShelf TypeBookshelvesAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrown, WhiteNumber of Shelf3
